text: This is the results breakdown of the local elections held in the Balearic Islands on 8 May 1983. The following tables show detailed results in the autonomous community's most populous municipalities, sorted alphabetically. ==Overall== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:right; font-size:95%;"
